Research

Journal/Preprint

  1. Zhou, Z., Xin, Y., Chen, H., Zhang, C., & Liu, L. (2020). Pareto Deterministic Policy Gradients and Its Application in 5G Massive MIMO Networks. ArXiv Preprint ArXiv:2012.01279.
  2. Zhou, Z., Liu, L., Jere, S., Zhang, J. (C., & Yi, Y. (2020). RCNet: Incorporating Structural Information into Deep RNN for MIMO-OFDM Symbol Detection with Limited Training. ArXiv Preprint ArXiv:2003.06923.
  3. Bai, K., Yi, Y., Zhou, Z., Jere, S., & Liu, L. (2020). Moving Toward Intelligence: Detecting Symbols on 5G Systems Through Deep Echo State Network. IEEE Journal on Emerging and Selected Topics in Circuits and Systems.
  4. Zhou, Z., Liu, L., & Chang, H.-H. (2020). Learning for Detection: MIMO-OFDM Symbol Detection through Downlink Pilots. IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, 19(6), 3712–3726.
  5. Zhou, Z., Liu, L., & Zhang, J. (2019). FD-MIMO via Pilot-Data Superposition:Tensor-based DOA Estimation and System Performance. IEEE Journal of Selected Topics in Signal Processing, 13(5), 931–946.
  6. Cousik, T., Shafin, R., Zhou, Z., Kleine, K., Reed, J., & Liu, L. (2019). Cogrf: A new frontier for machine learning and artificial intelligence for 6g rf systems. ArXiv Preprint ArXiv:1909.06862.
  7. Zhou, Z., Fang, J., Yang, L., Li, H., Chen, Z., & Blum, R. S. (2017). Low-rank tensor decomposition-aided channel estimation for millimeter wave MIMO-OFDM systems. IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications, 35(7), 1524–1538.
  8. Zhou, Z., Fang, J., Yang, L., Li, H., Chen, Z., & Li, S. (2016). Channel estimation for millimeter-wave multiuser MIMO systems via PARAFAC decomposition. IEEE Transactions on Wireless Communications, 15(11), 7501–7516.
  9. Zhou, Z., Liu, K., & Fang, J. (2015). Bayesian compressive sensing using normal product priors. IEEE Signal Processing Letters, 22(5), 583–587.

Conference/Workshop

  1. Zhou, Z., Jere, S., Zheng, L., & Liu, L. (2020, December). Learning for Integer-Constrained Optimization through Neural Networks with Limited Training. NeurIPS 2020 Workshop on Learning Meets Combinatorial Algorithms.
  2. Zhou, Z., Jere, S., Zheng, L., & Liu, L. (2020, December). Learning with Knowledge of Structure: A Neural Network-Based Approach for MIMO-OFDM Detection. 2020 IEEE Asilomar Conference on Signals, Systems, and Computers.
  3. Bai, K., Liu, L., Zhou, Z., & Yi, Y. (2020). Detection Through Deep Neural Networks: A Reservoir Computing Approach for MIMO-OFDM Symbol Detection. 2020 IEEE/ACM International Conference On Computer Aided Design (ICCAD), 1–7.
  4. Zhou, Z., Liu, L., Chandrasekhar, V., Zhang, J., & Yi, Y. (2020, February). Deep Reservoir Computing Meets 5G MIMO-OFDM Systems in Symbol Detection. AAAI-2020 Thirty-Fourth AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence.
  5. Zhou, Z., Fang, J., Li, H., & Blum, R. S. (2017). Channel estimation for millimeter wave MIMO systems over frequency selective channels via PARAFAC decomposition. 2017 IEEE 85th Vehicular Technology Conference (VTC Spring), 1–6.
  6. Zhou, Z., Gao, X., Fang, J., & Chen, Z. (2015). Spherical wave channel and analysis for large linear array in LoS conditions. 2015 IEEE Globecom Workshops (GC Wkshps), 1–6.
